history.proof: intros Q a p q Hrplus Hcan Hnz. induction Hrplus. - apply Rstar_0. qsimpl time: 1 use: reduce_mults. - apply Rstar_n with (y := mults multA (n:=n) a y). + qsimpl time: 1 use: reduce_mults. + apply IHHrplus. srun best use: reduce_imp_reduceplus, canonical_reduceplus.

ctx: intros Q a p q Hrplus Hcan Hnz.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a : Term A n x, y : list (Term A n) H : eqP A eqA n x y Hcan : canonical A0 eqA ltM x Hnz : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a Unable to unify "reduce ?M2209 ?M2210 ?M2211 ?M2212 ?M2214 ?M2215 ?M2216 ?M2217 ?M2219 ?M2220 ?M2221 ?M2222 ?M2224 (mults ?M2216 ?M2225 ?M2226) (mults ?M2216 ?M2225 ?M2227)" with "eqP A eqA n (mults multA (n:=n) a x) (mults multA (n:=n) a y)".

ctx: intros Q a p q Hrplus Hcan Hnz.
apply Rstar_n with (y := mults multA (n:=n) a y).
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable plusA.

ctx: intros Q a p q Hrplus Hcan Hnz.
apply Rstar_n with (y := mults multA (n:=n) a y).
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables A1, plusA, invA, minusA, multA, divA, a.

original: intros Q a p q Hrplus Hcan Hnz. induction Hrplus. - apply Rstar_0. apply reduce_mults; auto. - apply Rstar_n with (y := mults multA (n:=n) a y). + apply reduce_mults; auto. + apply IHHrplus. apply canonical_mults_inv; auto.
